mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS(userNum, id , password, name, sex, phone, address, email, type, createdAt, status) VALUES (USERS_SEQ.nextval, #{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{sex}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{email}, #{type}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 10)
mapper.select:
select u.userNum, u.id, u.password, u.name, DECODE(u.sex,10,'남자', 20, '여자')as sexType, u.phone, u.email, DECODE(u.status, 10, '활동중', 20, '휴면')as statusType, DECODE(to_char(sum(pi.getpoint-pi.used),'999,999,999,999,999'),null,'0',to_char(sum(pi.getpoint-pi.used),'999,999,999,999,999'))as totalpoint from USERS u LEFT join point pi on pi.usernum = u.usernum
group by u.userNum, u.id, u.password, u.name, DECODE(u.sex,10,'남자', 20, '여자'), u.phone, u.email, DECODE(u.status, 10, '활동중', 20, '휴면') ORDER BY u.userNum
where ${searchOption} like '%'||#{key_word}||'%' group by u.userNum, u.id, u.password, u.name, DECODE(u.sex,10,'남자', 20, '여자'), u.phone, u.email, DECODE(u.status, 10, '활동중', 20, '휴면') ORDER BY u.userNum
mapper.update: UPDATE USERS SET status = #{status}, updatedAt = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE userNum = #{userNum}
mapper.select: SELECT u.userNum, u.id, u.name, u.nickname, DECODE(u.sex,10,'남자', 20, '여자')as sexType, u.phone, u.zoneCode, u.address, u.address2, u.email, to_char(u.createdAt,'YYYY-MM-DD')as createdAtString, DECODE(u.status, 10, '활동중', 20, '휴면')as statusType, ui.profile, ui.content2, DECODE(u.type, 100, '관리자', 200, '회원', 300, '비회원')as usersType, to_char(sum(getpoint-used),'999,999,999,999,999')as totalpoint FROM users u INNER JOIN userinfo ui ON u.usernum = ui.usernum INNER JOIN point pi ON pi.userNum = u.usernum WHERE u.usernum = #{userNum} group by u.userNum, u.id, u.name, u.nickname, DECODE(u.sex,10,'남자', 20, '여자'), u.phone, u.zoneCode, u.address, u.address2, u.email, to_char(u.createdAt,'YYYY-MM-DD'), DECODE(u.status, 10, '활동중', 20, '휴면'), ui.profile, ui.content2, DECODE(u.type, 100, '관리자', 200, '회원', 300, '비회원')
